summary: A man travels from China to Vietnam, on the brink of war with America, to retrieve his uncle and cousin but find complications when he falls in love with a female gangster with a dangerous ex.
cast: Yun-Fat Chow|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Anita Mui|Kien Shih|Saburô Tokitô|Wai Lun Cheng|Maggie Ho-yee Cheung|Yeung-Wah Kam|Ling Nam Lam|Hsiang Lin Yin|Chi Wai Wong|Kirk Wong|Wai Tam|Wei-Ho Tu|Chi-Mun Ho|Hsin Liang|William Cheng|Lung Fei|Yin Nam
keywords: woman with a gun|saigon|vietnam|vietnam war|hong kong
title: Amor y muerte en Saigón
